title: On-site garage parking, Stand-up showers, In-unit washer/dryer
posting_body: Want more information on this unit?
Scott Street Lofts are being designed to include all the modern amenities you want and deserve.
Our standard features will be enhanced by trendsetting elements that will make residents feel at home the moment they walk in.
Every detail has been considered with you in mind, and our apartment for rent will fit all your needs.
- Clubhouse with a full kitchen and fireplace
Exit 45 on Scott Street go under 45 come 2 lights down on make U turn on street Polk and make a quick right on Sampson Street the Scott Street Loft's will be on your left-hand side
Regarding communities that allow pets, only dogs, cats fish and birds are allowed, no more than two (2) animals of any kind are permitted per apartment.
Dogs and Cats will require an additional deposit of $150 foe each animal as well as a $150 non-refundable
Pet rent of $10 per month per pet will be required.
Dogs whose breed or dominant breed weight exceeds 99 lbs.at full maturity are restricted pet interviews are required.

Be prepared to present vaccination records and provide pictures upon interview pets must be restrained on a leash always in common areas Pet owners ae required to walk pets in the designated areas and will be responsible for cleaning and disposing of pet waste from these areas.
Specific animals, breed, number, weight, restrictions, pet rules, and pet deposits will not apply to households having qualified service/assistance animal(s).
Applicants must make at least 2X the monthly rent amount
